sledgehammer.lua.permissions

Class PermissionGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.lua.LuaObject
        • sledgehammer.lua.LuaTable
          • sledgehammer.lua.MongoLuaObject<M>
            • sledgehammer.lua.permissions.PermissionObject<MongoPermissionGroup>
              • sledgehammer.lua.permissions.PermissionGroup

  • public class PermissionGroup
extends PermissionObject<MongoPermissionGroup>
    PermissionObject designed to handle permission-group data and operations for the Permissions Module.
    Author:
    Jab

      • getAllPermissionNodes

        public java.util.List<Node> getAllPermissionNodes()
        Returns:
        Returns a List of PermissionNodes from the parent PermissionGroup (If the PermissionGroup has a parent), along with the Permission Nodes provided in the Permission Group.
